name: FreebieSelect
author: FreebieSelect

sections.description:
This plugin will download, store and embed the daily selected free samples offer from FreebieSelect main site and allow you to add the freebie to your post by a simple tag ( [freebieselect] ) and also allow adding of the latest image on the sidebar as a widget. You can use our content even as a full blog post!
To insert the freebie in your post just add the tag [freebieselect] wherever you want the content to appear on your blog
sections.installation:
1. Upload freebieselect folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. To add widget to your side bar, goto Appearance> Widget

short_description: Download freebie offers from FreebieSelect.com to your site and embed it to your site
